bioconda.name: vcftools
bioconda.summary: A set of tools written in Perl and C++ for working with VCF files.

biocontainers.name: vcftools
biocontainers.summary: Provide easily accessible methods for working with complex genetic variation data in the form of vcf files.

biotools.summary: Provide easily accessible methods for working with complex genetic variation data in the form of VCF files.

bioschemas.name: VCFtools
bioschemas.summary: Provide easily accessible methods for working with complex genetic variation data in the form of VCF files.
